column1:
Get the cheapest shipping rates for free!
Start shipping at www.pirateship.com
The most affordable USPS service for packages that weigh less than 4 lbs, delivered in 1-4 weeks depending on the receiving country's postal service.
Chat with our customer support to request our exclusive Simple Export Rate service & save up to 50% off these rates!
We recommend adding a Declared Value to purchase insurance, just in case packages are lost or damaged.
Use the "International Country Codes" to determine which group each country is in.
Commercial Pricing - The cheapest rates USPS offers for this service!
No Monthly Fees - No Markups - No Minimums - Pirate Ship is FREE because we get paid by the carriers, not by you!
